summary: All new features tested and working - Backend refactoring (v2.0.0), Lesson Search (debounced, dropdown with results), Print View (/print/$lessonId), User Profile (/profile with edit functionality), Profile link in navbar. Backend: 22/22 tests passed. Frontend: All new features verified via Playwright.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 14 tested backend refactoring and new features. Backend successfully refactored from monolithic server.py to modular routes (13 router modules). New features working: 1) Search bar in navbar with debounced search and dropdown results, 2) Print view at /print/$lessonId with print-friendly layout, 3) User profile page at /profile with edit functionality, stats, activity. All existing features continue to work after refactoring.

backend_refactoring.notes: Health check returns version 2.0.0, all routes working via modular routers

lesson_search.notes: Search bar in navbar, debounced API calls, dropdown shows results with title/passage/ageGroup/theme badges

print_view.notes: Print page shows lesson content in print-friendly format with action buttons (Print, Download PDF, Back)

user_profile.notes: Profile page shows user info, stats, activity, subscription status. Edit mode works with save functionality

profile_nav_link.notes: Profile button visible in navbar when logged in (desktop), Profile link in mobile menu

existing_features.notes: Login, lessons list, lesson detail, coupon validation all still working after refactoring
